record.title: AUTHORIZING COQUILLE INDIAN TRIBE TO CONVEY LAND

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate proceed to the immediate consideration of H.R. 2863, which was received from the House.

record.chair: The clerk will report the bill by title.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the bill be read a third time and passed, the motion to reconsider be laid upon the table, and that any statements relating to the bill be printed in the Record.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
